121111122122.content:
Your throughts filled with rage at this company for trying to screw you over not only once but twice! You launched forward, your strike was clumsy but it had desperation and surprise behind it. You landed a hellish uppercut to the false woman’s jaw and she flew back, she landed heavily on the ground, but you wouldn’t give her enough time to react. Even the greatest martial arts masters to ever live needed a good base to launch the majority of their counter attacks. You rammed yourself upon her narrow hips, straddling her violently as you pounded her false face in. The metal beneath her false skin stinging your knuckles as you landed blow after blow upon her. Clearly she was unable to react quickly enough to the continuous strikes you launched. A human would have whimpered or groaned in pain but the android was eerily silent as you beat her face in.

As the reddish blood haze dropped your vision several minutes later, the android no longer even looked human, Her skin was broken in several areas, the top of her skull removed, the processors beneath the skin and steel clearly broken, she was truly dead as machine could get. You slowly pulled yourself off her body, her nude false flesh torn in dozens of areas as you had clawed and scraped and torn her to ribbions basically. It was not as pretty or detailed as some of the styles the supposed martial arts taught android could have done but it hardly mattered now. With a final grunt of rage you kicked the false girl in the head and stormed inside. You redialed the same service number once more and spoke into the phone a tone filled with menace and fowl intent. “You ever send a machine like that after me again, and maybe I will come and kill you next time, Pick up your busted piece of shit off my lawn.” You hung up and walked into the bathroom to clean up.

“Fucking sex dolls not worth the fucking effort.” You muttered as he wiped some of the dirt off your face.

The end~
